titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 203 West Paige Street in Tompkinville, Kentucky, as the "Tim Lee Carter Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 3/29/2001--Introduced. Designates the U.S. Postal Service facility located at 203 West Paige Street, in Tompkinsville, Kentucky, as the Tim Lee Carter Post Office Building.
